name: Portfolio Landing Pages
description: OneTrust Home Loans landing pages featuring flagship Portfolio Loan products. Designed as a customizable, extensible Gatsby template that is easily reusable for different loan types.

name: OneTrust Home Loans Loan Originator Websites
description: Business sites for OneTrust's sales team. Designed as a template that can be used for every team member and multiple brands - other examples include lo/tkaraba and lo/jeremy

name: OneTrust Home Loans Branch Websites
description: Sites for OneTrust retail branches. Click on a city/state panel to check out that individual branch.

name: OneTrust Home Loans Recruitment Website
description: Recruiting website designed to help grow OneTrust's sales team. Hilight of this project - building a custom method of vertical and horizontal scrolling animations.

name: Virginia Commonwealth University Metropolitan Education Research Consortium Website
description: Homepage for a department of Virginia Commonwealth University's School of Education. Learning the TerminalFour CMS and how to implement a fully custom design within its limitation proved to be an interesting challenge.

name: Virginia Commonwealth University Center for Emotional & Behaviorial Health Website
description: Homepage for a student wellness center at VCU. Built as a custom WordPress theme designed specifically to the institution's needs.
